Nightlight::

Nightlight just could see what was going on there, she couldn't guess 
where she, Technosis, Trinity and Zeni would hide... Zeni?... Zeni!!! 
Where could he be?.

"Gramps... please " begged Nighlight "Do you know where's Zeni??? 
Still anything has happened, this could be solved and we can fight 
against that guy... "

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: Get loose from what?
> 
> BIC:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "You said he's an assassin out to kill your family why would he 
stop from 
> killing you?"  He still keeps his back to Gramps and his left arm 
pointed 
> back to shoot if necessary.  As a slight precautionary measure he 
folds his 
> wings up against his back so that if Gramps did shoot it would 
probably 
> damage a wing but nothing of major importance.
